line.text: Weary with toil I haste me to my bed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The dear respose for limbs with travel tired
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But then begins a journey in my head
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To work my mind when body work expired
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For then my thoughts (from far where I abide)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Intend a zealous pilgrimage to thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And keep my drooping eyelids open wide
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Looking on darkness which the blind do see
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Save that my soul imaginary sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Presents thy shadow to my sightless view
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which like a jewel (hung in ghastly night)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Makes black night beauteous and her old face new
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Lo thus by day my limbs by night my mind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For thee and for my self no quiet find
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
